Moreover, I do get she should be held accountable for her beliefs, but also I think in this instance it's abundantly clear exactly why those were her beliefs (Johnny's horrible ego and spiritual needs), so I think one shot of extremely uncomfortable public humiliation more than suffices. He may be over from his 15 minutes simply having timed out which doesn't feel great to say but Amber's dealt hand shouldn't be slighted just bc her ex is finding his time has come and very likely on a subconscious level just didn't want to go out alone.
